About.Name: Tsion N Ballo
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Tsion Ballo. I am a passionate Information Systems student with a keen interest in software development and programming. Currently, I am pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in various areas of Information Systems, with a particular focus on C++ programming.

I enjoy tackling challenging programming projects and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers.

Beyond the classroom, I actively engage in extracurricular activities at my church, teaching students amarhic, basic intro coding, as well as creating apps for my church. I believe in the importance of continuous learning and seek out opportunities to explore new technologies and methodologies.
